name: Wahl Clipper Rechargeable Cord/Cordless Haircutting & Trimming Kit for Heads, Longer Beards, & All Body Grooming - Model 79434
short_description: Long Run Time - These clippers feature convenient cord/cordless use options with 60 minutes of cordless run time. Long-lasting easy-to-clean stainless-steel precision blades enable no-snag cutting.
A Smooth Cut Every Time - Powerful, long lasting, rechargeable battery and self-sharpening steel blades that stay sharp longer and are removeable for easy cleaning
The Perfect Grooming Kit - Including 12 attachment guards for home hair cutting & trimming with everything you need to achieve the style you want
Give the Gift of Quality - Makes great personal gifts for the men in your life Dads, husbands, and boyfriends will love this top-rated precise clipper for any occasion

The Brand Used by Professionals - Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919; Featuring self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction
product_description: Take control of your haircuts at home with the Wahl Clipper Rechargeable Cord/Cordless Hair Cutting kit. If you like to keep your look clean and fresh without having to take multiple trips to the barber, this kit has everything you need. Made with removeable stainless-steel blades that are easy to clean and stay ultra-sharp for long-lasting performance. As well as, powered by a rechargeable battery, this Wahl hair clipper for men delivers superior cordless cutting power with up to 60 minutes of runtime on a full charge and provides the ability to use while plugged in if needed. Are you a frequent traveler? No worries with this hair clipper, it contains world-wide voltage (100-240V) so you can take it with you! This hair clipper also comes with 12 attachment guards ranging in size from 1/16” to 1”, enabling you to cut all kinds of hair styles with precision and accuracy. And that's not all! Also included in this 21-piece grooming set are additional grooming accessories that make home haircutting even easier: scissors, comb, blade guard, hard case, hair clipper oil, cleaning cloth, and 2 cleaning brushes so you can keep your blades in top condition. Get ready to experience quality-level haircuts from home! With its advanced cordless/corded technology and versatile performance, the Wahl Clipper Rechargeable Cord/Cordless Haircutting & Trimming Kit is perfect for creating perfect hairlines and haircuts at home. Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self-sharpening precision blades Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave. Note: We test our mens hair clipper for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. They are not hair and can be simply wiped off the hair clipper kit.

short_description: SELF-SHARPENING FULL METAL BLADES stay as sharp as day one and do not require oiling
13-IN-ONE TRIMMER choose from 13 pieces to trim your beard, head, nose and ear hair; 8 length settings (0.5mm-16 mm) for a wide range of styles from clean stubble to long beard.
DETAIL TRIMMER the click-on narrow trimmer blade adds extra definition effortlessly to the details, crafting your look with precision
ERGONOMIC HANDLE makes the trimmer easy to hold and maneuver, providing you with the comfort and control you need to perfect your look
POWERFUL BATTERY delivers up to 60 minutes of runtime and the battery indicator light makes charging easier; USB-A charger cable, NO wall adapter included
RINSEABLE blade and combs for easy cleaning
product_description:
Try out a new look any day of the week with the durable Philips Norelco All-in-one 3000 electric trimmer for beards and head use. With 13 attachments, self-sharpening metal beard trimmer blades for long-lasting precision, and rounded tips for gentler trimming, this versatile and efficient electric razor for men efficiently tackles all your grooming needs.
 
 Effortlessly trim and style with precision blades, beard combs, and attachable detail trimmer that deliver clean, straight lines. Use the adjustable hair-clipping comb for quick touchups at home. Plus, easily remove unwanted nose and ear hair without nicks or cuts with the nose hair trimmer attachment.
 
 Experience gentle and comfortable cordless grooming with unique Philips Norelco blade technology featuring rounded tips for a softer touch on your skin. The tool's ergonomic grip allows for easy handling and maneuverability, giving you the comfort and control needed to achieve your ideal facial hair look or hairstyle. Philips Norelco multigroom attachments resist bending and the removable heads rinse clean for quick maintenance.
 
 Built to last, the durable battery in this men's all in one trimmer offers up to 60 minutes of runtime for uninterrupted beard grooming or hair cutting. The light indicator shows the battery charging status. With USB-A charging, it's easy to power up anywhere (adapter not included).
 
 The Philips Norelco All-in-One 3000 Series comes with a warranty of up to 5 years¹.
 
 ¹ 2 years + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com

name: Manscape Body Hair Trimmer for Men, Waterproof Pubic, Groin & Ball Shaver, No-Nick Mens Electric Grooming Kit with LED Display, USB Rechargeable, Adjustable Guide Comb
short_description: 【Full Body Grooming Kit】MAXGROOM manscape body hair trimmer includes: 1 V-shaped body trimmer head for safe and comfortable grooming of sensitive areas, beard trimmer head with adjustable guide comb (1-9 mm), 1 foil shaver head for a smooth, close shave, and 1 nose trimmer head for detailed touch-ups. From your face and beard to body grooming and intimate areas, this single kit delivers unmatched versatility and performance.

【Gentle On Sensitive Skin & Areas】This body shaver features hypoallergenic stainless-steel blades, designed to minimize skin irritation, making it ideal for even the most sensitive skin. The ergonomic R-shaped blade with rounded tips ensures a smooth, tug-free glide over delicate areas, including: underarms, chest, pubic area, groin and ball.

【Unique V-Shaped Trimmer Head】The innovative V-shaped trimming head is designed to reach narrow and hard-to-access areas such as the back, underarms, groin, pubic region, and buttocks. Its ergonomic I-shaped design fits comfortably in your hand, giving you complete control and precision during every trim.

【Cutting Lengths Adjustable】This beard trimmer comes with an adjustable dial comb for beard trimming, just rotate the dial on the comb to change the length settings from 1mm to 9mm, you can create different shapes of beards precisely.

【Waterproof For Wet & Dry Use】The whole body of this ball trimmer adopts waterproof material, reaching IPX6 level, you can freely enjoy wet and dry grooming in or out of the shower; Cleaning is a breeze—simply rinse it under running water after use.

【Long-lasting Battery with LED Display】MAXGROOM pubic hair trimmer for men is powered by a large-capacity Lithium-ion battery, providing 90 minutes of cordless use after a full charge. The intelligent LED display shows real-time battery status and reminds you when it’s time to recharge, ensuring you’re never caught off guard.

product_description:
The Philips Norelco Body Groomer 5000 Series is designed for comfortable whole body hair grooming, including intimate areas. Featuring a unique interchangeable dual-head system, the 5000 Series men's grooming kit enables you to effortlessly switch between body hair trimming and shaving.
 
 Our skin-friendly, dermatologically tested body hair shaver has Triple Protect technology ensure confident grooming, even in your more sensitive parts.
 
 Alternatively, swap to the men's electric trimmer head and choose from one of the adjustable trimming, intimate, or bi-directional body combs to achieve a precise and even result, even in sensitive areas, without worrying about nicks and cuts.
 
 This grooming trimmer for men features an ergonomic grip for more control even in tough-to-reach-areas and is 100% showerproof for convenient wet & dry shaving. For best results, use on dry hair before showering. To clean, run head and cutting element under water. Its high-power rechargeable battery allows for up to 100 minutes of cordless trimming or shaving after a 1-hour charge.
 
 The Philips Norelco Body Groomer 5000 Series never needs to be oiled and comes with a warranty of up to 5 years¹.
 
 ¹ 2 years + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com
